title: Educational Technology Integration Design for Enhancing Corporate Manager Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Offline environment focusing on smartphone-based learning tools. Verifying real-world task application skills through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Analyze the four stages of the Educational Technology Integration Lifecycle (ITILC)—disconnected components, misdirection, weak areas, and key dilemmas—to cultivate the ability to diagnose barriers to technology adoption in organizations.
Acquire the ability to design department-specific educational technology implementation plans using the 3D ITD (Information-Technology-Instructional Design) framework.
Enhance the ability to build and operate real-time feedback systems using smartphone-based collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace, MS Teams).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
